com.alex_gorisse.gwt.dragmovedrop.listener
Class DragDropListenerCollection

java.lang.Object
  com.alex_gorisse.gwt.dragmovedrop.listener.DragDropListenerCollection

public class DragDropListenerCollection
extends java.lang.Object

. The central collection of all drag drop objects and event ; affect the Drag and Drop listeners and contain all fire method which allow to add a drag drop listener to the widgets

Author:
agorisse

addDragListener

public final void addDragListener(com.alex_gorisse.gwt.dragmovedrop.listener.DragSourceListener myListen,
                                  com.alex_gorisse.gwt.dragmovedrop.drag.DragMother myDrag)
. Adds a drag event to Widget. Creates a new Vector if widget doesn't have events Else, it add a new event to the widget List

Parameters:
myListen - the drag event to apply on widget (drag object)
myDrag - the widget which receive the event

addDropListener

                                  com.alex_gorisse.client.ObjetB myDrop)
. Adds a drop event to Widget. Creates a new Vector if widget doesn't have events Else, it add a new event to the widget List

Parameters:
myListen - myListen the drop event to apply on widget (drop object)
myDrop - the widget which receive the event

fireDragOnDrop

public final void fireDragOnDrop(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget wid,
                                 int x,
                                 int y)
Fired the event onDrop to the drag Object, when it is released on a drop Target,

Parameters:
wid - the widget sending the drag event
x - the x coordinate of the mouse
y - the x coordinate of the mouse

fireDetectDrop

public final void fireDetectDrop()
. fired when a drag detect a drop target for the widget's moving, handle : the drag static position, which is more performed than using the sending position by the mouseMove method myDrop : All the drop position that we have to compare with the drag ones
